00029 canonMotion::canonMotion(std::string canonL, machineStatus prevStatus): canonLine(canonL,prevStatus) {
00030   status.setEndPose(getPoseFromCmd());
00031 }
00032 
00034 gp_Ax1 canonMotion::getPoseFromCmd() {
00035   double x,y,z,a,b,c;
00036 
00037   //need 3,4,5,and -3,-2,-1
00038   x = tok2d(3);
00039   y = tok2d(4);
00040   z = tok2d(5);
00041   gp_Pnt p(x,y,z);
00042 
00043 /* FIXME
00044   uint s = canonTokens.size(); //a,b,c are last 3 numbers
00045   c = tok2d(s-1);
00046   b = tok2d(s-2);
00047   a = tok2d(s-3);
00048   //now how to convert those angles to a unit vector (i.e. gp_Dir)?
00049 */
00050   //for now we take the easy way out
00051   gp_Dir d(0,0,1); //vertical
00052   assert (a+b+c < 3.0 * Precision::Confusion());
00053   return gp_Ax1(p,d);
00054 }
